name: Wagner Story
description:
Wagner Story

ワグナーの物語

Date: April 1st 2022

Genre: Life Simulation, Visual Novel

This game is made to be an promotion to an upcoming webcomic called Record Of Kingdom Sun.

An Isekai about an young novelist name Haida Yamato got struck into an world to be gifted by an mysterious woman who give him an power to became an Knight of kingdom sun.)

The main objections of the game, You have to socially with me to help me to know me to know more about you and your activity. - Wagner (Empress Of Kingdom Sun)
